mapper.insert: insert into news(`id`, `title`, `summary`, `author`, `content_url`, `content_html`, `institution`,`image_url`, `publish_time`, `create_time`, `update_time`) values(#{id}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{author}, #{contentUrl}, #{contentHtml}, #{institution}, #{imageUrl}, #{publishTime}, now(), now())
mapper.select:
select id, title, summary, author,institution, content_url, content_html, image_url, publish_time, top_flg, status from news where 1=1
and status=#{status}
and status in(#{item})
order by top_flg desc, publish_time desc

select * from news
and status=#{status}
and status in(#{item})
order by publish_time desc
